Title: Silverstripe admin XSS Vulnerability via WYSIWYG editor
Description: It is possible for a bad actor with access to the CMS to make use of onmouseover or onmouseout attributes in the WYSIWYG editor to embed malicious javascript.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.0.3 before 1.0.4, all versions starting from 1.1.0 before 1.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.3, all versions starting from 1.0.4 before 1.1.0, all versions starting from 1.1.1
